name: Nameless Story
description:
A short prototype developed with GameMaker. An exercise at making a textless action platformer. There are only 2 stages and most of the art is placeholder.

DEFAULT CONTROLS

- Movement: Left and Right arrow keys

- Dodge Roll: Tap Left or Right arrow key twice

- Jump: Z key

- Melee Attack: C key

- Absorb Attack: X key

CREDITS

- Game design, art and programming by Gregory Rodrigues Torres.

- Special thanks to Lucas Costa Cabral Zanenga for his contribution in concept, level and enemy designs.

- Music composed by DjDaddio.
